root: ^&Welcome to Gothic Glam. Let me know if you need anything!
^!I follow Amelia straight to the music section. She scours the shelfs for her favorite vinyl.
^!I let her do her own thing, while I go check out the rest of the store.
^!I stare down this one shirt based on my favorite band, My Synthetic Love, when…
^!I look up at who ran into me, and she’s beautiful. Her jet black hair is perfectly silky, and her dark eye makeup makes her eyes shine.
^%Apologies. I was staring down this shirt for my daughter, and wasn’t looking where I was going. My name is Jade, by the way.
^!Her accent is almost vampire-like in the most elegant way.
^!She points up to the exact same band shirt I was looking at.
^@I’m [INSERT PLAYER NAME]. Wow, your daughter has good taste! My Synthetic Love rocks.
^%I am quite enamored with their music as well… What’s the song you would deem your favorite?

CHOICEMADE: ^%In my humble opinion, Werewolf Dollars is superb.
^@Would you care to join my daughter and I for a pretzel?
^!Oh god, I probably made it too obvious that I’m trying to flirt with her…
^%Hmm… That would be pleasurable, but I have a parent-teacher conference with my daughter over there later this afternoon.
^!She points to an gothic silver-haired teen in the anime section, seemingly debating between a Devil Killer or Battle on Giant shirt.
^@My daughter, Amelia, is the one over there, staring at the vinyls. Maybe they could be friends! We just moved to town, so she hasn’t met any friends yet.
^%Lilith would be delighted. I shall go grab her.
^!While Jade gets her daughter, I head over to Amelia to quickly purchase her vinyl.
^@Amelia, you won’t believe it. I met this totally awesome, fellow single mom in the band section.
^!The cashier scans Amelia’s item and puts it in a Gothic Glam bag as I hand him a twenty dollar bill.
^Oh is it that lady with the Victorian outfit? She’s pretty.
^@Yeah! She invited me over to her house tonight. Let me introduce you to her!
^!I grab Amelia’s vinyl, and walk over to Jade who’s standing outside the Gothic Glam door with her daughter.
^%Hello, Amelia. Pleasure to meet you. This is my daughter, Lilith. Do tell her about yourself, Lily.
^%Lily partook in an art competition and won. It was quite delectable.
^!I feel a sense of competitiveness overtake me.
^@Well Amelia recently got a scholarship after she submitted some of her photographs.
